乙：在△BDF 與△CEF 中，$\angle 1 = \angle 2 = 9 0 ^ { \circ } , \angle 3 = \angle 4 , \overline { { B D } } = \overline { { C E } }$ $\therefore \angle B D F cong \triangle C E F \therefore \angle A B E = \angle A C D$ 在△ABE 與△ACD 中，$\angle A = \angle A ^ { \prime } \angle A B E = \angle A C D ^ { \prime } , \angle A E B = \angle A D C = 9 0 ^ { \circ }$ ∴ △ABE～＝△ACD∴ ${ \overline { { A B } } } = { \overline { { A C } } }$ ∴ $\triangle A B C$ 為等腰三角形
